section.name: Layout
section.p: The UMLX generator exports Class Diagrams using a simplified layout. Most UML tools provide graphical editing features to organize UML elements in a diagram. Because the UMLX generator cannot compute such an organization of elements, (this is a complete different challenge!) it uses a simple table-based layout. For each Java package one diagram is generated. Each diagram is composed of UML classes and interfaces and their direct relations to other classes and interfaces. For each class, its UML representation is shown on the left and all its relations to other elements on the right. Relations can be inheritance (super and subclasses), interfaces and associations.
